jekyll-leaflet
Getting Started Samples API Ref

Create leaflet.js maps in Jekyll. As easy as:

{% leaflet_map { "zoom" : 9 } %}
    {% leaflet_marker { "latitude" : 41.881832,
                        "longitude" : -87.623177,
                        "popupContent" : "Hello World from Chicago!" } %}
{% endleaflet_map %}
